웹 브라우저의 항상 HTTPS 사용하기 기능이 활성화되어 있으면, 해당 웹 사이트의 문제로 오류 페이지로 리다이렉트되게 됩니다.

Google Chrome의 설정 페이지(`chrome://settings/security`)에서 해당 기능을 비활성화하시고 http://swo.seoul.go.kr/ 로 방문해보세요.

<details><summary>Details</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/98787049/234bf90a-cbf9-4e62-94ea-28d084e6b264)

</details>

AdGuard for Android

V4.1

Website or app doesn't work properly

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Microsoft Authenticator (com.azure.authenticator)

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. When AdGuard is enabled, no 2FA notifications from a Microsoft account arrive. Even when the app is open and I refresh to look for login attempts, nothing shows up.

No screenshots, app doesn't allow it.

issue.title: www.viva100.com

labels.name: A: By Design
labels.description: The issue cannot be resolved due to technical, ethic, or legal reasons

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# 죄송합니다. 해당 웹 사이트는 애드쉴드(AdShield, Inc)에 의해 감염되었습니다.

안타깝게도 이 웹 사이트는 안티 애드블록 전문 회사인 애드쉴드의 서비스에 의해 보호받고 있어 일반적인 애드블록 규칙로는 처리가 까다롭습니다.
애드쉴드는 대한민국 정부의 기술 창업 지원 프로그램으로부터 최대 2년에 7억원을 받습니다.

이러한 기록은 [여기](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+)에서 검증하실 수 있습니다.
대한민국 정부의 지원 사실은 [여기](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777)에서 확인하실 수 있습니다.

## 유저스크립트 설치
[microShield 유저스크립트](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield)를 설치하여 애드쉴드 광고를 차단하시길 바랍니다.
한국어로 작성되어 있는 설치 가이드라인은 [이 URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.ko.md)를 방문하여 확인해주세요.


## 그래도 문제가 있으신가요?
유저스크립트를 사용했을 때 발생하는 문제는 [이 이슈 트래커](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues)로 알려주세요.
기타 문제는 [이 곳](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues)으로 알려주세요.
GitHub 이슈를 사용하시기 어렵다면, filters@adguard.com 로 문의해주세요.

the problem is with app, not a site

Mobile

No screenshots, app doesn't allow it.

comment.body:
I've just tried with all the features turned off in the Protection page, and it still doesn't work. The only thing that makes it working again is the main switch on the home page, or deactivate the switch to route the traffic through AdGuard for that app.

The app connects via WiFi to a network broadcasted by the smart device. Maybe there is an issue just by the fact that there is a middle-man in the network traffic?

comment.body:
It seems that this issue is caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please disable this filter list or add this rule:
```adblock
baidu.com#@#.share-list
```
to user rules.

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

V4.1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Meross (com.meross.meross)

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, EasyList, Adblock Warning Removal List, NoCoin Filter List, Legitimate URL Shortener

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Setting up a smart home device with the Meross app fails when Adguard is enabled. Tried with several Meross MSS310 smart plugs.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

The setup process stays on this screen for a few minutes before failing.

![Screenshot_2023-09-01-04-11-22-51_56b7547d8e4eb7c7b8ab580c8df8134f.jpg](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/49079695/65488670-1f74-4b67-9255-31cc68e7d0f3)

</details>

comment.body:
> Is device rooted? Which status of HTTPS filtering of this app option?

No root, no HTTPS filtering in any app.

> Is the problem with a browser, or with authenticator app?

With the app. I initiated the login from a PC, and the problem is about the Microsoft Authenticator app not receiving the notification.

> Isee in the log
`10:01:32.562 [threadmanager-cached-pool-2-thread-64] INFO  VpnBuilder - Excluding app from VPN: name=com.azure.authenticator uid=10366`

And what does that mean? 
Just to let you know, these are the logs with a few tests, you got tries in it that worked because I disabled the filter, and tries that didn't work because I enabled it again.

The last test is with the filter enabled and the notification failing.

issue.title: Meross device pairing error (com.meross.meross)

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

V4.1

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

Meross (com.meross.meross)

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, EasyList, Adblock Warning Removal List, NoCoin Filter List, Legitimate URL Shortener

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Setting up a smart home device with the Meross app fails when Adguard is enabled. Tried with several Meross MSS310 smart plugs.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

The setup process stays on this screen for a few minutes before failing.

![Screenshot_2023-09-01-04-11-22-51_56b7547d8e4eb7c7b8ab580c8df8134f.jpg](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/49079695/65488670-1f74-4b67-9255-31cc68e7d0f3)

</details>



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
すみません。自己解決しました。以前も不安定になったことがあったことを思い出し、
1、設定→一般設定→設定を初期化する　から設定を一度リセット。
2、設定→一般設定→設定をインポート　安定していた数日前に保存していた設定をインポート
これで再度先程のサイトを読み込んだら、正しく表示されました。
　スマホでテザリングしてネット利用してます。前回、モバイル接続で不安定なのが原因なのかもしれないと指摘されたのですが、それが再発したのかもしれません。pingや速度測定しても不安定な要素は見つかってはいないのですが。
